SELECT COUNT(NO) FROM CONTRACT
WHERE CONTRACT_DATE BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
ORDER BY CONTRACT_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(NO) FROM CONTRACT
WHERE ${searchOption} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY CONTRACT_DATE DESC

SELECT BUSINESS_NAME AS businessName, BUSINESS_REG_NUMBER AS businessRegNumber, CEO_NAME AS ceoName, MID AS mid FROM CONTRACT WHERE MID IS NOT NULL
AND ${searchOption} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY CONTRACT_DATE DESC
SELECT BUSINESS_REG_NUMBER FROM CONTRACT WHERE BUSINESS_REG_NUMBER LIKE #{regNumber} AND MID IS NULL
